member.name: M:IRIS.Systems.InternetFiling.GatewayServer.Delete(IRIS.Systems.InternetFiling.GatewayDocument)
member.summary: Sends a delete request to the gateway specified in gtwDoc.Url, the gtwDoc must have a valid correlation identifier (i.e. it must be in the gateway somwhere.
member.param: The full assembled gateway document object
member.returns: The reposnse receoived from the gateway, this will usually be the deleteion ackowledgement
